title: Two For One Special
description: Twice the temptation. Twice the pleasure. One love.  Damien and I love to share. The feeling of a woman trapped between our bodies—making her moan and beg and soar? Epic. Undeniable. When Macy shows up at the bar, Damien’s ready for a steamy night. She’s sexy and flirty and all woman. But I know she’s more than a curvy fling. If we play it right, she could be our forever.  I never thought a hot man would be into me. Let alone two. But when they hold me close, I can’t deny it. The way they tear their hands up my skin and grind against me on the dance floor—it’s more than I’ve ever dreamed of. And everything I want. There’s only one thing holding me back. Am I brave enough to give two men my heart?  Standalone, steamy ménage short story. Intended for mature audiences only.
author: Marie Carnay
